CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transactions ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, transactionid VARCHAR(50), itemname VARCHAR(40), date VARCHAR(20), totalamount VARCHAR(40), email VARCHAR(40))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS items ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, itemTitle VARCHAR(100), itemCompany VARCHAR(50), itemPrice VARCHAR(650), itemIcon VARCHAR(50))
